net.marfgamer.jraknet.client

Class MaximumTransferUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.MaximumTransferUnit

  • public class MaximumTransferUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents one of the maximum transfer units used during login
    Author:
    MarfGamer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MaximumTransferUnit(int maximumTransferUnit, int retries) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaximumTransferUnit()
      Returns the size of the maximum transfer unit
      int getRetries()
      Returns the default amount of retries before the client stops using this maximum transfer unit and lowers it
      int getRetriesLeft()
      Returns how many times retry() can be called before yielding 0 or lower
      void reset()
      Sets the amount of retries left back to it's default
      int retry()
      Returns how many retries there are left and then lowers it by one

      • getRetriesLeft

        public int getRetriesLeft()
        Returns how many times retry() can be called before yielding 0 or lower
        Returns:
        How many times retry() can be called before yielding 0 or lower without calling reset()
